The [exercises](exercise_solutions.qmd) tab contains solutions to many of the problems in the book, including the computer-based exercises.

The [Notebooks](notebooks.qmd) tab contains Quarto/Jupyter/Pluto notebooks for the chapters in the book.

The [Code](code.qmd) tab contains code for some algorithms used in the book.

The [Interactive](interactive.qmd) tab contains interactive Observable widgets.
